page.title: 08ST.PAUL'S DOVE HOLES.
page.content: The Rev.D Burnett became vicar of Dove Holes in l985.Previously he was only curate.Born in Truro,Cornwall,he lived at Bristol before coming to Dove Holes The church is l07 years old & was built as a chapel of ease to Chapel Parish Church.It is no longer in that parish,the change taking place on March 20th l985 partly because Chapel has expanded & partly to encourage the smaller churches to integrate. The parish which measures l0 miles across is made up of Dove Holes,Peak Forest, Wormhill & Peak Dale.The vicar's home is being altered to bring it up to standard for a parish vicarage.The yearly running cost of the church is Â£5000-Â£6000.On Sunday there is one main service followed by Sunday School soon to be called the "Adventurers".
